channel.title: bm_generate_menu_images problem
channel.description:
Hey guys! I've got a problem with bm_generate_menu_images. When I use it to get the loading screen pictures, doesn't work and says me in the console: "Enabled cheat to use bm_generate_menu_images". When I go to the export folder (bms/materials/vgui), there isn't any folder called multiplayer with the .vtf and .vmt files in it. Please, help me! D:
I used this guide: [url]https://www.blackmesagame.com/bms_workshop_guide.pdf[/url]

item.title: bm_generate_menu_images problem
item.dc:creator: Alaiskai
item.description:
OK, I’ve could do the bm_generate_me_images, but the next problem is this:

“This server instance is now crippled. Restart the server to continue gameplay.
Only menu images for the current aspect ratio have been generated. Select a different aspect ratio, restart the engine and run m_generate_menu_images” again to complete the menu image set."

What should I do?

EDIT: Fixed, no problem

Read full topic

item.title: bm_generate_menu_images problem
item.dc:creator: Alaiskai
item.description:
Hey guys! I’ve got a problem with bm_generate_menu_images. When I use it to get the loading screen pictures, doesn’t work and says me in the console: “Enabled cheat to use bm_generate_menu_images”. When I go to the export folder (bms/materials/vgui), there isn’t any folder called multiplayer with the .vtf and .vmt files in it. Please, help me! D:

I used this guide: https://www.blackmesagame.com/bms_workshop_guide.pdf
